review_title: Great bday gift!
reviews:
Purchased for son's upcoming 18th birthday and I'm sure he will love it as he collects mugs.
Came the next day in perfect shape.

review_title: Great for those who struggle to get water intake!!
reviews:
I struggle so much with getting my daily intake of water and this has already helped. The medications I'm on require extra water and this is absolutely perfect!
Very sturdy for carrying, easy to clean.
It's huge!! Also comes with cleaner for straw and edges.

review_title: Came broken, soaking through box!! Top broken :(
reviews:
This was disappointing because I can't return it for a new bottle.
Came broken at the top, box soaking wet. Product drained down to label.
Whole house smells, so it probably would be very effective but it won't spray properly.
Never had an issue with Amazon's packaging like this, unless it was the manufacturer.

review_title: Would definitely recommend for underneath exercise equipment!
reviews:
This fits under our indoor exercise bike perfectly as we have wood floors and were concerned about using it without a mat.
Very thick, had over a month now and with 2 people of different sizes and weights on the bike, no problem at all. Extremely pleased.

review_title: Excellent for extra calories, protein, blood sugar and tastes great!
reviews:
My still growing son is 17 and drinks one (sometimes 2) of these per day plus his regular vitamins.
For vegetarians like himself, and needing as many calories as possible, plus the protein, these drinks are excellent. He loves the flavor as well.
As he doesn't have alot of sugar in his diet and his predisposed to type 1 diabetes, these are perfect for his blood sugar.

review_title: Perfect gift for any HIMYM Barney Stinson fan!
reviews:
Gave to my son as a graduation "gag" gift, totally took him by surprise.
We watched the series twice and it has been his favorite show, who couldn't love Barney!?!
Book also is a nice tough in his man cave. Lots of laughs already reading this, and a great keepsake!!

Will definitely get "The Bro Code" for another special occasion later on.

review_title: Great grad gag gift!
reviews:
Nice little book for notes or journalling, got a laugh at the graduation party.
Came in perfect shape, would definitely recommend.

review_title: Fantastic lights, amazing service!
reviews:
Bought the 32.8ft as a graduation gift for my son to do up the basement (his man cave!) with and we were both thrilled.
Very easy to put up, extremely bright and so many colours and settings to chose from!!
I was so happy with the customer service as I thought the battery died on the remote after having it only 2 or 3 days. I went out to buy a new battery but it turned out to be the remote. Customer service was excellent and immediately sent out another one, checking to make sure I was happy with the product and service.
Would definitely recommend buying from them!!

review_title: Great value for the money, just what I was looking for!
reviews:
I've had a hard time finding good dish towels for drying that don't cost a fortune. This was a great deal and they get the job done, and look nice too!!
Would definitely purchase again and recommend.

review_title: Great padding and added protection for my bike seat (and my own!)
reviews: Bought for Marcy foldable bike for added comfort and it definitely made a huge difference! Fit the bike perfectly. I imagine this is made to fit most indoor bikes as their seats are a bit larger, I'd check out their other models for outdoor speed bikes if you have one.

review_title: Was hoping for more tension but no regrets, love it!
reviews:
Ok, so looking around for an exercise bike has been a struggle. I read on line about this bike outside of Amazon and then looked it up...sure enough it was sold out, but for the reviews online and the PRICE I ordered one anyways and within 2 weeks it was delivered.
I just set it up tonight and it was extremely easy, pull out the silver tab in the middle which keeps it in it's foldable position, and you're set!
It'll keep you moving for sure, but if you're like me and like spin classes for tension then this may not be for you. The tension of 8 I felt more like a 2 to me, however I personally can't afford a heavy duty spin bike and would rather work on my legs with other exercises and going outdoors.
I also love how small this is and that for my place as I don't have room for anything any bigger.
Super easy to fold up but no wheels on the bottom.

review_title: Beautiful gift for graduation and mug collector!
reviews:
It's absolutely perfect.
Son is very sentimental and a collector of mugs when we travel.
He loved it!!

review_title: Just what I was looking for and just as described!
reviews:
Bought as a gift and they said they loved it, hard to find these around anymore.
Super fast service and was exactly as described.

review_title: Wonderful investment, pain and anxiety relief!!
reviews:
I bought this for fibromyalgia pain and and to also use as for anxiety for my son and I.
He absolutely loves it!!
We've gotten a little creative using it for vibration/music therapy for anxiety which seems to be extremely helpful as buying an actual system or going to go to a session can be extremely expensive. Just use a favourite calming choice of music and set the vibrations all to the same steady
frequency.
We've had this almost a month now and it is used at least 2x a day minimum!!

review_title: Recommended by my counselor, just what I needed.
reviews: Painful read for women who have never been close to their mother's. However this is a must have if you have always or question feeling unloved, judged, controlled by your mother all your life, and so much more.

review_title: Amazing WARM hat for anyone!!
reviews:
My son loves these, along with the Carhartt coat and hat for the cold winter, especially working outdoors.
Solid brand. Highly recommend!!

review_title: Sizes are big!! But highly recommended!!
reviews:
Carhartt was awesome with returning the first coat we ordered as the medium DROWNED my son (his other winter coat is a medium, and he's 6ft1).
The small was a world of difference and fit perfect. He loves this coat and has worn it all winter, great for his job outdoors too.

review_title: Warm and worth every penny!!
reviews:
My son loves these, along with the Carhartt coat and hat for the cold winter, especially working outdoors.
Solid brand. Highly recommended!!!

review_title: Unfortunately won't buy again.
reviews: I usually purchase another brand for my son but I figured these would taste the same...ooops! He still takes them every day but I did try a "little bit", NOTHING like the other brand. Great deal for so many but the taste is awful.

review_title: This is more than all you need if you're on a budget!
reviews:
Bought this for my teenage son, he absolutely loves it.
Sounds great.

review_title: Exactly what we were looking for and a great price
reviews: Perfect!!

review_title: Came with a broken CD case.
reviews:
Love the CD as I love MUSE.
However, I was very disappointed to open the package and find the CD as seen.
Broken apart, and no extra piece in the package.
Won't order from this buyer again.

review_title: LOVE
reviews:
Exactly as shown. With 4 loops inside for duvet...just have to feel around!!!
Absolutely love.

review_title: Very helpful especially for back sleepers!
reviews: This has been the best pillow I've used or owned yet. I had an accident with my neck and shoulder several years ago and sleeping is a nightmare. I find that it really helps keep your head in position if you're a back sleeper like myself and even my chiropractor noticed a difference.

review_title: Exactly as described. Love them!
reviews: Perfect!! Beautiful and dainty. Exactly as described. Arrived within 2 days. Thank you!

review_title: So far so good!! Fast shipping. Feels great.
reviews: Packing was great, sealed, and doesn't expire for several years. Very light orange citrus scent. No mess with pump. So far so good!!

review_title: Pure gold. LOVE!!!
reviews: NEVER disappointed with ANYTHING by muse. One if the most underrated bands out there.

review_title: Would definitely recommend, just use a "duvet" cover!
reviews: My son has a lot of anxiety and ADHD. He absolutely loves this blanket and is sleeping so much better. My only wish was that it came with a cover as the sizing is different and there's no washing it. Otherwise fantastic and delivered right to our door.

review_title: No complaints!! Great value!!!!
reviews:
My son chose this for his 11th grade back to school. Very sturdy, full of pockets for organizing and he was thrilled with it.
Nice and tough bag even for a 16 year old!! Very fast shipping.

review_title: PERFECT!!!
reviews: Just as described. Birthday gift for my golfing mom who was THRILLED with this and loved the touch of the crystals! Great find, unique and fast delivery!

review_title: Absolutely purrrfect. Great deal and fast shipping!!
reviews:
I have to admit I was a little concerned when I opened this and saw how small the top was as my indoor cats are on the "chubby" side, with the heaviest being 18 pounds! My son laughed away as we (very quickly) put this together thinking it would be a total waste of money too. As our cats can only see outside the front window when it's open, I thought a stand would be purrrfect for them. The moment it was assembled one of them was right up in the top small getting cozy then it was a battle between the 2 since, even both in the top at one point last night!!
They absolutely LOVE it!!!! With all the weight I was concerned of tipping but it has been remarkably sturdy. Just tighten everything well and you should be set. Excellent deal, was here so fast and they also love the scratching posts!!!

review_title: Simple... It's George Michael. Fast shipping. Love.
reviews:
Re-ordered this DVD as I wore my other one out after years and years of playing it.
If you're a George Michael fan, this is a MUST HAVE.

review_title: Beautiful, vibrant and fast shipping!!!
reviews: Love it! Perfect for my son and I, and our love of elephants. So many colours and just as bright as shown in photo. Just hung up and waiting for the wrinkles to come out from packaging of course. Thank you again for such fast shipping!! Can't go wrong.
